activities: Envision Pharma Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliates may receive a number of different types of data from the EEA and/or Switzerland including data about: employees, potential employees, and their family members; consultants; employees and consultants of clients; authors; clinical and medical investigators and staff conducting clinical and medical research; healthcare professionals; clinical study participants; patient data; vendors; investors and shareholders.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data regarding employees/potential employees, clients, client employees and consultants, consultants, vendors, authors, healthcare professionsals, medical investigators, clinical trial participants, patient data, investors and shareholders, including manually processed data
recoursemech: JAMS Safe Harbor Program for non-human resources data; EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for HR data only
